actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Social Security Act to exclude certain payments to retired judges from the social security wage base.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to provide that pensions received by retired judges who are assigned to active duty shall not be treated as wages for purposes of title II.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 and the Social Security Act to exclude certain payments to retired judges from the social security wage base.
